List 89

I was inspired by Huyen Chip to make this list. My list of things I wanna do before I leave this life.

  1. ~ Be kind
  2. ~ Challenge the Status Quo
  3. ~ Act Like an Entrepreneur
  4. ~ Have an “It can be done, it can be improved” Attitude
  5. Get married with the one i love
  6. Be a good father
  7. Visit America
  8. Visit North Pole
  9. Visit South Pole
  10. Visit Everest Base Camp
  11. Start my own company (I had two)
  12. Start a non profit organization
  13. Drive a boat/ship with a license
  14. Have a trip to Son Doong cave
  15. Read 500 books
